emergency.title: üö® MMOSUP∆êN A W∆Ü HIA
emergency.message: Mete ase. Wonny…õ anko. Y…õsr…õ s…õ fa dina biara. W…în a w…îkyer…õw ama wo. Wonni mm…îbor…î. Mmoa w…î h…î.

faq1.question: K…înd…îm nni adi paa s…õ?
faq1.answer: K…înd…îm nni adi paa 98% s…õ wode yie biara. W…îboa kwan STI nhy…õ HIV so. Fa k…înd…îm foforo biara.

faq2.question: M…õka tumi aba mma me nn…î…î mu?
faq2.answer: Aye, nanso mmba p…õ. Sperm nni adi w…î ahonu mu kwa nn…î…î 5, enti s…õ wo nn…î…î no kakra a, aba mma no b…õtumi aba. Fa mmoa biara.

faq3.question: M…õka b…õy…õ biribiara s…õ m…õy…õ STI?
faq3.answer: STI pii nni nhw…õso biara. Nhw…õso ahorow: adum, ns…õn, …îd…î…î w…î nn…î…î mu, anaa nsa nni mu. Y…õ d…î…înz…î…î s…õ wo d…î…înkor…în.

faq4.question: HIV nni tumi a y…õde nya?
faq4.answer: HIV nni tumi a y…õde nya, nanso w…îtumi ay…õ no. Antiretroviral therapy (ARVs) ma w…în a w…îy…õ HIV no anya ahonu a …õw…î h…î. S…õ wode y…õ a, viral load b…õtumi anya nsie.

faq5.question: Mpene y…õ biribiara?
faq5.answer: Mpene y…õ adi a w…îp…õ s…õ w…îy…õ biribiara. ∆êw…î s…õ w…îde ma no, w…îtumi anya no bio, na s…õnea anaa "mba p…õ" nny…õ mpene.

faq6.question: M…õka b…õnya k…înd…îm a …õw…î mf…õ?
faq6.answer: K…înd…îm a …õw…î mf…õ w…î ahw…õne…õ ahorow, PPAG clinics, obaa ahy…õ, na NGO biara w…î Ghana.

faq7.question: M…õka b…õhw…õ stress no?
faq7.answer: Stress a …õy…õ yie: ad…î…î a w…îy…õ bio, nn…î…î p…õ, nsa a w…îfa obi a w…îp…õ, nn…î…î a w…înya mu, na dwumadi a w…îp…õ.

faq8.question: M…õy…õ biribiara a m…õp…õ s…õ m…õnya no?
faq8.answer: Fr…õ mmosup…õn dina seiseiara (Suicide Prevention: 0800234567). Nsa a w…îfa obi a w…îp…õ, k…î…îns…îla, anaa d…îkta. Wonny…õ anko, na mmoa w…î h…î.

faq9.question: M…õtumi nya morning-after pill no nka kwa?
faq9.answer: Aye, emergency contraception (Postinor-2, Plan B) w…î ahw…õne…õ mu w…î Ghana. Nni adi paa w…î nn…î…î 72 a w…înya mu.

faq10.question: M…õka b…õd…î…în HIV no?
faq10.answer: HIV d…î…înz…î…î w…î Voluntary Counseling and Testing (VCT) centers, ahw…õne…õ, na PPAG clinics. D…î…înz…î…î no k…înfid…õntial.

welcome.text: S…õ wo adwene akwahosan no ay…õ no a …õy…õ paa s…õ wo ahonu ahohonua no ay…õ. Adwene akwahosan no boa wo nne…õma nyinaa, gye s…õ nhonam akwahosan, abusuab…î, ne wo ahonu ahohonua no nyina.
